About the Company: Vivo Bio Tech Ltd (VBTL) is a contract research company engaged in biotechnology and pharma drug discovery activities. VBTL provides services ranging from insilico design, wet lab contract research, preclinical research and clinical studies spanning the entire drug discovery value chain.The Custom Research Services group at Vivo Bio Tech offers a complete line of protein services, including gene synthesis, cloning, expression and purification of recombinant proteins and monoclonal antibodies. In-vitro Services offers solutions for pharmacologic, toxicological & bioanalytical investigations in drug discovery & development. Critical investigations like bacterial reverse mutation assays, chromosomal aberration, and micronucleus are some of the specialty services offered by the company.
